title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 20.27 - Reports of unclaimed vehicles by garage operators
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 20.27 - Reports of unclaimed vehicles by garage operators

State Regulations

Upon receipt by the department of a report of an
unclaimed vehicle by a garage operator pursuant to subdivision (c) of section
2129
of the Vehicle and Traffic Law, the department shall acknowledge such receipt
and, if possible, shall furnish the garage operator with the name and address
of the owner of the vehicle and the owner with the location at which the
vehicle is being held. The garage operator's report shall contain any
identifying information relating to the vehicle including, if possible, license
plate number and vehicle identification number, and the name and address of the
garage operator holding the vehicle and the date the garage operator took
possession of the vehicle. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
20.27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
